Pre-Game Insights: Former Black Stars midfielder Emmanuel Agyemang-Badu has expressed confidence in Ghana’s potential to secure victory against Egypt in their second group stage match at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).
Despite Egypt’s 2-2 draw against Mozambique and Ghana’s 2-1 defeat to Cape Verde in their respective opening matches, Badu remains optimistic about the Black Stars’ chances against Egypt.
Badu acknowledged the challenge of the encounter but expressed hope for Ghana’s success with the right preparations.
The former Black Stars midfielder highlighted the importance of coach Chris Hughton’s proper selection for the match against Egypt.

As both teams aim for a crucial victory to enhance their tournament prospects, the upcoming clash promises to be a closely contested and highly anticipated encounter, set to kick off at 8 p.m. on Thursday.
